name: Wizard Golf
description:
Minigolf with a twist! Attempt to finish the 9 levels in under 25 strokes, will attempting to manage the magical malfeance that comes with using a wizard's d20 as a golf ball.

Controls
Right click (While able to aim the putter): Toggle showing the full hole 
Left click (hold): Charge the putter, and release to swing
Right click (While holding left click): Cancel the current swing

Thank you to the the authors of the assets below
https://freesound.org/people/Stek59/sounds/457318/
https://freesound.org/people/JavierZumer/sounds/257224/
